Desc.eng: Hunter! The secret libraries did hide the way to destroy the Force Domes. Although it could easily be a mission that proves to be impossible.
Impossible missions are our main area of expertise. Should we choose to accept them.

You need a force that could destroy the elyctrical barriers, and I found you the rawest power of Borgovia. High upon the Thunderhead Mountains you'll find Perun, the god of storms. He was imprisoned for good, but if you break his chains, his thunderbolts will destroy the Domes.
The sheer force of nature against science? I like it. Wait for me and then we can go.
The sheer force of nature against science? Take us there.
Your servant is ready to take you to the mountains.
I need to take care of something first. Wait for me here.
We have no time to lose. Do your magic.
